title: I need an experienced, enthusiastic telemarketer for my Digital Marketing Company.
snippet:
We offer eight services, and we expect you to keep learning about them as much as possible as this is a long term position. The longer you stay employed with us, the more we will raise your hourly wages and the more money you will earn. We also offer a monthly bonus!

We expect clear English with integrity and enthusiasm to represent our company.

We are calling this a Sales Position, but your concentration is gathering "Leads" We will close the transaction in person. Even though it may seem like a simple "Lead Generating" position, it's far from simply collecting leads. The potential customers need to be educated & interested in our services.

Keeping track of whom you've spoken with, following up, & understanding that "Sales" has, it's good days & bad days but able to keep smiling is what will earn you a successful career with Printibution inc.
